question: Shirley wants to price a batch of exotic fruits at $12.345 per box. If she needs to calculate the price for 10,000 boxes, what is the total price?
She decides to sell premium berries at $0.6789 per pint. If a wholesaler buys 100,000 pints, what is the total cost?
Shirley sets the price of gourmet peaches at $45.678 per crate. If a distributor orders 1,000 crates, what is the total price?
For a special deal, she prices mixed fruit baskets at $0.09123 each. If she sells 100,000 baskets, what is the total revenue?
Shirley prices organic mangoes at $123.456 per dozen. If an export company buys 10,000 dozen, what is the total price?
Shirley wants to round the total sales amount of $12,345.6789 from a large fruit order to the nearest hundredth. What is the rounded amount?
Shirley has a premium fruit bundle priced at $987.6543. She decides to round this price to the nearest tenth. What is the rounded price?
The total revenue for a week is $45,678.9123. Shirley wants to report this amount rounded to the nearest whole number. What is the rounded revenue?
Shirley calculates the average price per fruit in a shipment as $3.14159. She wants to round this average to the nearest thousandth. What is the rounded average price?
The price for a large order of organic apples comes to $21,234.56789. Shirley needs to round this price to the nearest hundredth for the invoice. What is the rounded price?
Shirley offers a 0.125% discount on bulk purchases of apples. What is this percentage as a decimal?
A special sale gives a 78.95% discount on overripe bananas. What is this percentage as a decimal?
Shirley decides to apply a 0.375% promotional tax on a new fruit variety. What is this percentage as a decimal?
For a special holiday offer, Shirley gives a 99.999% discount on one lucky customer's purchase. What is this percentage as a decimal?
Shirley calculates her net profit margin for the year as 12.345%. What is this percentage as a decimal?
Shirley orders 6.21 metres of premium silk at $32.5 per metre. What is the total cost?
She packages 4.204 litres of organic honey at $60.5 per litre. What is the total revenue?
Shirley purchases 7.51 litres of cold-pressed olive oil at $9.2 per litre. What is the total cost?
Shirley buys 3.1416 kg of specialty cheese at $18.75 per kg. What is the total cost?
She sells 2.41525 litres of artisanal vinegar at $9.33 per litre. What is the total revenue?
